agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Corrections TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Thursday, February 14, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. James White The Committee will meet for an organizational hearing to hear invited testimony from criminal justice advocates and associations. Testimony will be limited to 7 - 10 minutes. The agenda will be available at the hearing. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
